Text.Page:
The sabertooth? Mine since it was a cub. It sure eats more now than it did then!

It eats like a gula...well, not really, but it has quite an appetite. Guess what it eats?"Gula meat?"

Close. Caimans.

Its favorite meal is the tail of a {@LinkCreature:472#2#azure caiman thumper}. But I think the caimans have gotten wise to my traps.

If you're going into the Golden Labyrinth, you might find some that the gulas keep as pets.

Bring back their tails! You don't want a grumpy sabertooth around here, do you?
This will keep my big baby happy. Or at least fed.
Look, if I could get into the Golden Labyrinth—and out again—I would.
